title: Howling Abyss Ultra Rapid Fire Mode 2015
body:
*(This Discussion assumes that U.R.F. has been teased by Riot to be played on Howling Abyss, http://postimg.org/image/voyqi3laj/ , source image: http://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-event/2015-mid-season-invitational )*

Having **U.R.F. Mode moved to Howling Abyss for 2015** is quite a disappointment for such a fun game mode. Restricting the Mode to Howling Abyss removes the range and diversity of champions, skills and OP-ness as the only way to win is by a select amount of champions (Ranged, Poke, CC Mages). The Lack of room on the map prevents the ability to dodge skills, confuse enemies, and almost refuses fun for melee champions. Champions like Lee Sin, Evelynn and even Alistar have been replaced with Nidalee, Sona and Lux. Making U.R.F. Mode available for all maps (or at least Summoner's Rift) will make the hype for League's favourite gamemode worthwhile.
